attributes.action: Find out whos plotting behind Gordon Browns back to Join Euro
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The vast majority in Britain don not want to be in EU and the thought of being controlled by brussels is a knighmare yet senior cabinet ministers are plotting to sign away the pound to Barroso.We want to know whos plotting to sign the uk into the EU even further?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
